1002_1_08_25_14_47_21.input:
1. Screen Settings:

Adjust the canvas width to 700 and height to 400. Do not alter the canvas size.

2. Object Motion & Parameter Settings:

Develop a Vpython animation to demonstrate the following physics experiment: Pendulum motion refers to the movement of an object suspended from a fixed pivot point, swinging back and forth due to gravity.

3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information:

(1) The length of the Pendulum is linked to the variable named Length_I with an initial value of 5.

(2) Upon a change in the value of Length_I, restart the animation from the beginning with the updated length of the Pendulum.
(3) Do not import packages that are not supported by VPython such as numpy, math and time
